description:
Faster, smarter, and even more beautiful: Meet the Sephora to Go app  

Shop Now – Faster & Easier
Our app keeps you signed in to your Beauty Insider account so you can:
• Shop on the go: Discover new makeup, skin care, fragrances, and beauty products, and easily reorder your past purchases
• Shop in store: See what’s in stock at your local Sephora, scan products to instantly read Ratings & Reviews, or tap on My Beauty Bag to access My Loves list and past purchases
• Shop recommendations: Find the best beauty products by exploring Today’s Obsession, What’s New, and Hot Now
• Shop inspiration: Get ideas for new looks with makeup tips and tutorials from videos on Sephora TV, photos on The Beauty Board, and articles on The Sephora Glossy  

My Beauty Insider – Instant Access to Perks
• Flash your digital Beauty Insider card to earn and redeem points in store 
• View your Beauty Insider points balance, rewards, and free samples
• Save your Beauty Insider card and gift cards in your app or Passbook for quick access 
• Receive alerts for Beauty Insider–only offers, exclusive products, promotions, and more
releaseNotes:
• Apple Pay, now accepted in the Sephora To Go app - the easy, secure, and private way to pay with your iPhone 6.
• Bug fix for Find In Store error
